title: Private Entrepreneurial Project
description: Building the future of family support through cutting-edge technology. Creating transformative digital solutions that empower families during their most challenging moments and revolutionize how we approach parental mental health. Where innovation meets compassion—designing tools that truly matter.
whyLoved: Building the future of family support through cutting-edge technology. Creating transformative digital solutions that empower families during their most challenging moments and revolutionize how we approach parental mental health. Where innovation meets compassion—designing tools that truly matter.

title: Lead Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Led end-to-end development across AI, data visualization, product lifecycle, and DevOps, delivering tested, scalable platform with strong focus on lifecycle ownership and performance
Managed integration of AI and data visualization to create actionable insights, optimizing system performance and user experience
Architected and implemented infrastructure solutions using AWS CDK, ensuring scalable and maintainable cloud deployments
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative IoT solutions that transformed data into meaningful business insights
whyLoved: The opportunity to work at the intersection of cutting-edge IoT technology and AI was incredibly exciting. Being part of a team that was genuinely pushing boundaries in photonics and data visualization gave me a sense of contributing to something truly innovative and impactful.

title: Project Based Contracts
achievements: Delivered end-to-end solutions for small companies, including full-stack development, infrastructure setup, and data architecture
Optimized systems and workflows to improve performance, scalability, and maintainability
Provided technical consulting and implementation for diverse client needs across different industries
whyLoved: The variety of projects and direct client interaction was incredibly rewarding. Each project brought new challenges and the satisfaction of seeing small businesses thrive through better technology solutions.

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Delivered platform architecture, infrastructure, and observability to support scalable and reliable systems
Led development of multiple full-stack applications using NodeJS, React, PHP Laravel, Python, and automation/testing tools
Implemented comprehensive monitoring and logging solutions to ensure system reliability and performance
Mentored junior developers and contributed to team knowledge sharing and best practices
whyLoved: The opportunity to work on complex, enterprise-level systems while mentoring and growing with a talented team was incredibly fulfilling. The focus on quality and long-term maintainability aligned perfectly with my engineering values.

title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Maintained the core Drupal CMS using Symfony, React, and Storybook for component development
Deployed CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins to AWS infrastructure, improving deployment reliability and speed
Ensured content management system stability for Denmark's national broadcaster serving millions of users
Collaborated with content teams to deliver seamless digital experiences for diverse media content
whyLoved: Working for Denmark's national broadcaster was a unique experience - the scale and impact of the platform was immense. Contributing to a system that millions of Danes rely on daily gave me a deep sense of purpose and responsibility.

title: Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Developed using TYPO3, PHP, JavaScript, and Python for comprehensive web application development
Implemented DevOps practices to streamline deployment and system management processes
Designed and delivered maps and data visualizations for big data insights, making complex information accessible
Built scalable solutions that supported Bolius's mission of providing housing and energy advice to Danish homeowners
whyLoved: Bolius was my first professional role and taught me the fundamentals of web development. The focus on data visualization and making complex information accessible to everyday people was particularly rewarding and shaped my approach to user-centered development.

title: Freelance Web Developer
achievements: Developed custom websites and portfolios for numerous Danish companies and prominent personalities
Built comprehensive e-commerce solutions with secure payment integration and inventory management
Created responsive, user-friendly interfaces using the modern web technologies and best practices of the time
Managed full project lifecycle from client consultation through deployment and ongoing maintenance
Delivered high-quality digital solutions that enhanced online presence and business growth
whyLoved: My freelance journey was incredibly formative - working directly with clients taught me the importance of understanding business needs and translating them into effective digital solutions. The variety of projects and direct client relationships built my foundation in web development and entrepreneurship.
